id: TIP: Assign roles with '{{.CurrentUser}} set-org-role' and '{{.CurrentUser}} set-space-role'
translation: 小贴士: 使用'{{.CurrentUser}} set-org-role'和'{{.CurrentUser}} set-space-role'来分配角色

id: BillingManager - Create and manage the billing account and payment info
translation: BillingManager - 创建和管理计费账户和付款信息

id: OrgAuditor - Read-only access to org info and reports
translation: OrgAuditor - 只读的访问组织信息和报告

id: OrgManager - Invite and manage users, select and change plans, and set spending limits
translation: OrgManager - 邀请和管理用户，选择和改变服务计划，设置配额限制

id: SpaceAuditor - View logs, reports, and settings on this space
translation: SpaceAuditor - 查看此空间中的日志，报告和设置信息

id: SpaceDeveloper - Create and manage apps and services, and see logs and reports
translation: SpaceDeveloper - 创建和管理应用程序和服务，查看日志和报告

id: SpaceManager - Invite and manage users, and enable features for a given space
translation: SpaceManager - 邀请和管理用户，针对一个指定的空间启用各项功能

id: Assign a space role to a user
translation: 给用户分配空间角色

id: Assign an org role to a user
translation: 给用户分配组织角色

id: Assigning role {{.Role}} to user {{.TargetUser}} in org {{.TargetOrg}} / space {{.TargetSpace}} as {{.CurrentUser}}...

id: Assigning role {{.Role}} to user {{.TargetUser}} in org {{.TargetOrg}} as {{.CurrentUser}}...
translation: 用户{{.CurrentUser}}正在分配角色{{.Role}}给组织{{.TargetOrg}}中的用户{{.TargetUser}}...
